about_the_game:
This is a CRPG game, you can operate a team of 5 people to explore together.

Gameplay introduction

The game uses a team combat system. Combat is real-time, but allows players to pause the game mid-game to give orders to their team members. (Controls refer to Dragon Age origins and Dragon Age 2)
Fight in the form of a team, a maximum of 5 people in the team, the player controls 1 person, the computer AI controls 4 people. To destroy the various types of evil, players must understand the abilities of each character and become familiar with their special abilities (spells, talents and skills), including healing characters, individual output characters, output auxiliary characters, group output characters, and hate creation characters.
Featuring a novel and scalable combat system, players will face intense group battles on a massive scale, using the special abilities of each teammate to eliminate enemies and bosses.
(Each BOSS has a unique battle mechanic, with boss battles referencing Dragon Age II and World of Warcraft.)
If you like Dragon Age, you can try to play this game
